name: Starcatcher (itch) (HiimLuki)
description:
Starcatcher is a space themed endless Plattformer.

A little astronaut is stranded in a colorless universe in between some asteroids, 

While catching stars he tries to bring back the color to the world. 

How to Play? 

You start your game with one minute left to catch as many stars as you can.

  • Use  A /  D or the arrow keys  to move around,
  • Use W / Arrow Up / Spacebar to fly
  • Catch Stars to collect them and add them to your counter to bring the world back to life
  • Catch the bigger stars to add time to your Timecount
  • Dont get hit by the meteorites

TEAM

Sarah Inés Roeder - 2D / 3D Art

Shalien Schmidt - 2D / 3D  Art

Lukas Schneller - Programming
